objects.text:
CLASSIC CANVAS SNEAKERS
NAVY BLUE URBAN CASUAL

• Premium Canvas Material
• Navy Blue Urban Design
• Cushioned Comfort Insole
• Durable White Rubber Sole

product_details.name: Classic Canvas Comfort: Urban Casual Sneakers in Navy Blue
product_details.description:
• Premium quality canvas material for breathable comfort
• Sleek navy blue design perfect for casual and smart-casual outfits
• Durable white rubber sole with excellent grip
• Metallic eyelets with matching navy laces for secure fit
• Lightweight construction for all-day wear
• Classic low-top silhouette with minimalist styling
• Cushioned insole for enhanced comfort
• Versatile design suitable for both men and women
• Easy-to-clean canvas exterior
• Perfect for daily wear, casual outings, and weekend activities

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern, grid-based layout divided into four quadrants with a bold and vibrant design. The top-left quadrant contains the prominent "heading" in a large white font, while just below it, the "subheading" in yellow provides emphasis. The "product_title" appears beneath it in crisp white type for context. The bottom-left corner includes the "description" of product features in a bullet format, followed by pricing details with the "original_price" in yellow and the prominent "discounted_price" in white. A bold yellow "cta_button" with "cta" text grabs the viewer's attention. The right side features a stylish pair of sneakers ("product_image") and abstract yellow-lined decorative elements. Geometric circles and soft gridlines enhance visual structure, while yellow dotted dividers and a "tagline" between sections add visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue `#1A3A5F`
- Sky Blue `#6B9AC4`
- Soft Blue Background `#E8F4FF`
- Yellow Accent `#FFD700`
- White `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of casual sneakers in a dominant deep navy blue color (#1E3264), giving the shoes a sleek and versatile aesthetic. The canvas material subtly reflects light, adding texture to the flat navy surface. The soles are a soft icy white (#E4E9F1), providing contrast while maintaining harmony with the upper tone. Metallic eyelets in silver-gray (#C0C0C0) bring subtle highlights and visual interest. This balance of muted and cool colors is ideal for an advertisement banner using a complementary palette of navy blue, icy white, steel gray (#B0B8C1), and accents of pale blue (#AFC7E1) for text or backgrounds.
